text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/map-target-list-mode defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
first Firstwhen the target list is being assembled, the items for this rule go first. If more than one rule defines a first item (for a given instance of mapping) then this is an error.
share Sharethe target instance is shared with the target instances generated by another rule (up to the first common n items, then create new ones).
last Lastwhen the target list is being assembled, the items for this rule go last. If more than one rule defines a last item (for a given instance of mapping) then this is an error.
single singlethe target instance is shared with a number of target instances generated by another rule (up to the first common n items, then create new ones).

name: StructureMapTargetListMode
title: Structure Map Target List Mode
description: If field is a list, how to manage the production.

concept.definition: when the target list is being assembled, the items for this rule go first. If more than one rule defines a first item (for a given instance of mapping) then this is an error.
the target instance is shared with the target instances generated by another rule (up to the first common n items, then create new ones).
when the target list is being assembled, the items for this rule go last. If more than one rule defines a last item (for a given instance of mapping) then this is an error.
the target instance is shared with a number of target instances generated by another rule (up to the first common n items, then create new ones).
